Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.rmi

Class RMIClient

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.ClientNetworkHandler
it.polimi.ingsw.network.rmi.RMIClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
RMIClientInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class RMIClient extends ClientNetworkHandler implements RMIClientInterface
The RMI Client is a client that uses the RMI (Remote Method Invocation) technology to communicate with the game server.
Author:
Luca Guffanti

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    init()
    This method initializes the network handler, by opening the socket connection in the case of a SocketClient or by executing the registry lookup in the case of a RMIClient.
    void
    messageFromServer(Message message)
    This method is remotely called by the server to send a message to the client.
    void
    requireDisconnection(String userName)
     
    void
    sendMessage(Message toSend)
    This method manages the RMI side of the sending of messages: If the message is the first ping response sent to the server, a new pinger thread is spawned and starts asynchronously pinging the server.

  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(Message toSend)
      This method manages the RMI side of the sending of messages:
      • If the message is the first ping response sent to the server, a new pinger thread is spawned and starts asynchronously pinging the server.
      Specified by:
      sendMessage in class ClientNetworkHandler
      Parameters:
      toSend - the message to send

    • messageFromServer

      public void messageFromServer(Message message) throws RemoteException
      This method is remotely called by the server to send a message to the client.
      Specified by:
      messageFromServer in interface RMIClientInterface
      Parameters:
      message - the message sent by the server
      Throws:
      RemoteException - thrown if there are connection issues
